name: Real-Time Collaborative Stock Tracker
body:
Real-Time Collaborative Stock Tracker

This project was built as a part of Free Code Camp's Full-Stack Development curriculum.

Summary

The project was built using Node.js, Express, Socket.io, Backbone.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, Chart.js, and Bootstrap.

User Stories

1. I can view a graph displaying the recent trend lines for each added stock. 2. I can add new stocks by their ticker symbol. 3. I can remove stocks. 4. I can see changes in real-time when any other user adds or removes a stock.

Try it:

https://real-time-stocks.herokuapp.com/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
